column2: Is the project institutionally sound and does adequate capacity exist for its successful implementation?
Istheexerciseofmanagerialauthoritybalancedwith accountability for results and does the organizational set-up encourage delegation of authority?

Are the functional (and reporting) relationships between the project entity and its parent organization (ministry, division, agency) and other planning, regulatory, and oversight bodies clearly defined?
Does the proposed project organization conform to the national laws, regulations, and operational procedures as well as the requirements of the external funding agencies?
Is the proposed project staffing commensurate with the project requirements?
Are training arrangements in place to ensure sustainable operation andmaintenance of the project after the construction phase?
